pr_title: Use the existing static method to get status codes for exceptions

timeline.message:
Use the existing static method to get status codes for exceptions.

- Make use of ServiceInvocationException.extractStatusCode() method instead of duplicating the same code.

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>

timeline.bodyText:
can you also fix the naming of the methods?
sendTelemetryMessageWithQos1 needs to be sendTelemetryMessageWithQos0 and
sendTelemetryMessageWithQos2 needs to be sendTelemetryMessageWithQos1 ...
timeline.author: sophokles73

replies.bodyText: Nice catch. I have renamed them now.
replies.author: kaniyan

timeline.message:
Fix method names to suit the context

Signed-off-by: Kartheeswaran Kalidass <kartheeswaran.kalidass@bosch.io>
